Hello

 

I don't know how to finish Chapter 4.

When I finished part "Updating the Store Index to query the database" and started the project, there was no genres list on Shop site. It looks like the data was empty, but I added SampleData to the project and did every part of tutorial before this step. It just looks like in ferry2 case:

http://store.picbg.net/pubpic/7D/E5/8113df2043e87de5.jpg

Hello Yaggar,

 

You must have made an typo error somewhere in part 3 and 4 because when you have done everything well, you must see this

Browse Genres

  • Classical
  • Jazz
  • Rock
